nav.div: Souderton Area School District » Coronavirus School Closure Update - March 30

p.span: I hope that this message finds you and your family well during this exceptionally unusual and challenging time.

br.span: Today, the governor announced that all Pennsylvania schools will remain closed until further notice. I am saddened by the news that we won’t have our children back in classrooms sooner.

Our teachers continue to develop lessons and support for at home learning. High school classes began new instruction in Schoology today, with Middle School beginning tomorrow, and Elementary School beginning on Wednesday, April 1st. We understand that this is a time of adjustment as we all navigate new ways to conduct school in the midst of the pandemic. I appreciate all that our families and staff are doing to work through this together.
Thank you for your continued patience during this unprecedented closure. Please check regularly for updates from our school district.

img.title: Frank Gallagher
